message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you at a starting price of $20,000. I believe it holds significant value and this reflects its worth.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. Could we possibly come to an agreement closer to my budget?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $20,000 is already a significant reduction from my initial asking price.  To make this work for both of us, how about meeting halfway at $15,000?
Thank you for considering my situation, Alice. I truly value this product, but unfortunately, I am unable to meet you at $15,000. Would you be open to discussing a price closer to $10,000?
